name: Glossier You Doux Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family:Earthy & Woody.Scent Type:Warm Woods.Key Notes:Sweet Violet, Palo Santo, Ambrox.Fragrance Description:Glossier You Doux is a soft, skin-scent-enhancing, woody fragrance that opens with sweet violet, followed by a precious blend of woody palo santo, frankincense, and smoky myrrh‚Äîheightened by a warm, musky base driven by ambrox..About the Bottle:The bottle is an objet d‚Äôart in its own right. It is crafted in-house at Glossier; it has the real thumbprint indent of the designer. So just like the scent, the bottle of Glossier You Doux is unfinished. It needs you to hold it to complete it..About the Fragrance:Impressions of You are not scents you wear to become someone else. Instead, they are skin-scent enhancers, meaning they smell a little bit differently on everyone. With musky, warm ambrox and ambrette base notes that wear close to the skin, they let you leave your unique impression.
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Fragrance/Parfum, Water/Aqua/Eau, Hydroxycitronellal, Eugenol, Limonene.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Spray scent as desired on your pulse points: your neck, behind your ears, your wrists, and more..-Allow fragrance to settle for a few moments rather than rubbing it in as this can disrupt the scent..-Apply post-shower and after moisturizing to aid absorption for a longer, stronger scent impact.

shades.shade_name: 1.7 oz / 50 ml eau de parfum spray

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Woooowww, I‚Äôm shocked. This is way better than the original. If you have a specific nose like me then this is for you. I‚Äôm the girl who love a good ‚ÄúVanilla base woody amber musk oud scent‚Äù and this is loved by me very specific nose lol

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite perfume. I love how it smells on me. But it doesn‚Äôt have a strong throw, so it‚Äôs one I‚Äôll spray on during a self care day when I‚Äôm staying home in comfy clothes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In love this this sent, so glad they came out with the new sents other than the original. Love the vinalla sent and lasts throughout the day, for sure worth it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the way this smelled in the store, and I love the way it smells in the bottle. After purchasing and wearing for several weeks, I feel I smell like stress swear when I wear it. It‚Äôs probably just a chemistry thing for me, but I have to Reuther it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My new fave!!! So good I had to buy a few bottles after my first purchase!! Love the soft and clean smell to it . Lasts all day and can‚Äôt get over the scent !!! Many compliments !!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: First glossier product I've bought and I'm in love. it's super earthy and cat approved! I spritz it on and tmi LOVE when I do laundry and I can still smell the perfume when putting clothes in the wash. it is long lasting in a light non overwhelming way. if you're a fan of palo santo and incense then you will love this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Warm & clean. I was skeptical at first bc of the hype but it‚Äôs so good? üò≠ I‚Äôve been wearing it for a week and get nothing but compliments. It‚Äôs also a truly androgynous scent as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you are looking for a pretty, easy, every day scent this is it. I love this so so so so much. On me, it dries down to a woody, sweet and clean scent. Something other than my normal vanilla :) people can smell it when you give them a hug and it lasts for quiet some time on my skin and clothes. My boyfriend always says omg you smell so good.

reviews.review_title: Was unsure at first, but I think it's a keeper...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I lean towards GN, spicy scents but always told myself I'd love Glossier You. When I finally got to the store to buy it, I was surprised at home much better this smelled to me. I bought it and it took a few days to warm up to it due to my preferences, but this smells great. I do wish the lasting power was stronger though...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this parfum!! It does last a few hours on me. I am a huge fan of woodsy scents and have gotten lots of compliments. It‚Äôs great for every day wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I feel bad for anyone who smells a hint of pickles in this perfume! It‚Äôs so creamy yet not sweet at all. It has a subtle musky and powdered quality, but in such an amazing and refined way.  I can't believe a scent with such elegant, clean-girl vibes is available at this price point‚Äîit's an absolute steal. For context, before discovering Doux, I had three perfumes in my regular rotation, all completely different from one another: Poppy & Barley by Jo Malone, Chance (the Eau de Parfum one) by Chanel, and Th√© Noir 29 by Le Labo.  I‚Äôm shocked that Doux is the most affordable of them all because I can‚Äôt stop wearing it! I get endless compliments, and despite being a subtle fragrance, it has an impressive projection. I‚Äôve tried wearing the traditional You in the past, but it didn‚Äôt last as long on my skin. Doux, on the other hand, is incredibly long-lasting. Even when I can‚Äôt smell it on myself anymore, others still notice it and compliment me!  The scent is hard to describe, but it perfectly embodies the quiet luxury aesthetic‚Äîrefined and unique. I‚Äôm obsessed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this smells identical to the maison louis marie no.04 bois de balincourt - strong pickle note lol idk why it smells like dill pickles but my boyfriend says it does as well. i mean if that‚Äôs your thing then get it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Generally, its a good parfum! If I‚Äôm correct, the Glossier You collection scents are made to smell a little different on everybody, to me, when I first spray, it‚Äôs very spicy and warm but settles in very nicely. It‚Äôs sweet and warm, unfortunately it does not last very long, maybe 2-3 hours.

i smelt this scent in sephora and it dosnt really smell that good. i was hoping it would smell good because i have the light pink one but honestly the light pink one is that best. personally i think it smells like baby powder

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a gorgeous fragrance, but it seems so diluted that it only lasts maybe an hour so on the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Out of the three glossier scents, this one is by far my favorite. It‚Äôs so good the only negative is that it doesn‚Äôt last long but I can‚Äôt get enough of this smell

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is very similar to Aerin Cedar Violet. I like it, but had I known that I wouldn't have purchased since they are nearly identical.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair
reviews.review_text: One of my favorites. I love it more than Glossier You. It truly is unisex. I‚Äôve had people tell me it smells like cologne but I LOVE it. It reminds me of a lighter version of Nette Vanille which I‚Äôm a huge fan of.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Reminds me of Juliette Has. A Gun-without the longevity! It really is a nice, unique, more uni-sex smelling perfume compared to the other one they released. I was not a fan of the first one on me personally, so I was excited for the new newest releases.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It‚Äôs ok but has a strange smell that I can‚Äôt quite put my finger on it. Kinda gives off cheap perfume vibes too.. but again each scent is different on everyone so maybe you‚Äôll like it. I‚Äôll keep wearing it to see if it grows on me. Glad I got the travel size tho, won‚Äôt order in full

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this for myself for Christmas. It's easily the best perfume I've ever smelled. I sprayed some on Christmas morning, and after 10 hours I could still smell it. Even after I showered I swear I could still smell it! I'll be wearing this daily and repurchasing for sure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: ITS SMELLS SOOOOO GOOD. I LOVE IT SO MUCH. I just wish that it lasted longer though. I spray it on my wrists and neck and it lasts only for like an hour or two. The smell is very subtle which I love but  I also wish that where was a bigger bottle of it because it‚Äôs really small  almost too subtle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair
reviews.review_text: my new favorite scent! I also get many compliments while wearing this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Long time fan of the original and curious how the new scents compared. This one is a sophisticated upgrade perfect for winter and fall. The other one wasn‚Äôt memorable to me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: incredible, amazing, delicious. i have never loved a scent more

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is such a lovely fragrance! It lasts all day and smells beautiful. The price point is great as well.

reviews.review_title: Sample from store had amazing lasting scent
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I sprayed this on me wrists one day while I was shopping and It wasn‚Äôt until after I left and It was the next day that I could still smell It on my jacket ( wrist area). I thought wow‚Ä¶ smells amazing and lasts long!  I drove back the next day and purchased It of course. Well I feel like the sample was more intense because It doesn‚Äôt last at all. Pretty sad about It. I agree with another review that stated the same thing.

I love this fragrance, and I often get headaches from perfumes. I've wanted to enter my perfume era but am very picky. If I find one I like, I usually get tired of it immediately. Not with this GEM! It‚Äôs light, cozy, and fresh 10/10

reviews.review_title: Doux me a favor and make Doux longer wearing!
reviews.review_text: Lovely scent!! I have gotten many compliments about how I smell in the last week or so I've had Doux! My only wish is that it had more lasting power on the skin and/or projected more. Spraying it on your clothes helps, but for the price, a longer-wearing scent should be a given.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: SMELLS like vanilla cake so good must get !!!!!!!!

reviews.review_title: Cremo Palo Santo Men‚Äôs Body Wash
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: had such high expectations for this scent as the notes align with my personal preferences, however, i was bombarded with the same scent as Cremo Palo Santo men‚Äôs body wash. does smell good but not a scent for this girlyü§ç

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scent so much but I have to return because for the price point it should last a lot longer on the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is one of my new favourite purfumes. love the packaging. the smell is long lasting. a nice warm and woody scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this perfume! I have been looking for a cheaper dupe to my regular scent Saint Rita's Parlor 'Rita's Car' and this hits all the marks! I love a muskier scent and I love how this smells on me in particular. Excited to see the duration/how long it lasts over the course of a day :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: glossier you is pretty good, but I would say this is much better. this perfume made me a happy camper!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I‚Äôve been a fan of the OG since it came out but I think Doux has taken the number 1 spot. Smells soo good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: it smells like mother nature in a bottle. its sweet and woody and smells a bit like palo santo incense. its so good and natural in a clean way

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Sprayed this on me in the Glossier store, smelled amazing, lasted long, immediately loved. Ordered from Sephora but it smells like nothing. Like, there‚Äôs no scent! I‚Äôm perplexed! What gives Sephora? Did I get a dud???

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This smell is addicting! I‚Äôm a perfume collector and I just found my new favorite in this. It‚Äôs sweet yet seductive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been searching for a signature scent for sooo long..I feel like I've tried everything and I have finally found it with the Glossier You Doux. It is warm and cozy, while also giving off clean girl vibes. The perfect scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite scent ever! I have always been so picky when it comes to fragrances and never found anything I really loved but this is amazinggggg.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not joking, on me this smells like pickles. In the initial seconds of spraying it on, I get the woodiness and something fresh, but definitely nothing sweet, violet, or vanilla (apparently some people smelled vanilla even though it doesn't seem to be a listed note). Immediately afterwards, all I get is pickles. Projection is very quiet - this is the kind of perfume that others will only smell on you when they hug you. Longevity is surprisingly strong (lasted almost a week on a paper tester and a full 24hrs on my wrists) although that probably wasn't great for me because that meant I smelled like pickles the whole day. Don't listen to tiktok, everything there is aestheticized and/or advertised. If you can, try on in store before buying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Glossier Doux is my new signature scent. It makes me feel like I took the substance! Like a more sultry emotional version of myself. It‚Äôs a versatile & truly blanket soft scent. The longevity is about 6 hours. The porjection is personal but leaves a really stunning scent trail. Smells like the best crystal shop you‚Äôve ever been in

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smells fresh and clean. Veryyyyyyy similar to the scent of a MAC makeup wipe.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is so good! I love woody scents and this one is delicious. It has a great wearing time as it lasts a while, and the bottle design is so pretty! It‚Äôs the perfect fall/winter fragrance. Get it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smell is amazing.  Longevity is great.  Received compliments after eight hours of wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells horrible!! The og is so much better, makes you smell like a nursing home

reviews.review_title: Fingers crossed a travel size is released soon!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this for an everyday scent. It's sexy, understated and perfect for those days in the office/work where you crave a subtle scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is extremely unique, it‚Äôs feminine but not sweet or overpowering. It has a creamy dry down, super warm and fresh, it‚Äôs exactly how they describe: your skin but better!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells divine and lasts pretty much all day. I love it

reviews.review_title: Doux is a new daily wear!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've cherished my bottle of the original You for years, using it sparingly to make it last because it‚Äôs such an exceptional fragrance. When I saw the new releases, I couldn‚Äôt resist trying them‚Äîafter all, You is a tough act to follow. I have to say, I might love Doux even more! On my skin, it‚Äôs beautifully palo santo-forward with a creamy undertone, creating a scent that feels like wrapping yourself in a cashmere sweater‚Äîsoft, luxurious, and comforting. If you‚Äôre not a fan of woody or musky fragrances, this might not be for you, as it leans heavily in that direction. The response to Doux seems pretty divided, but while the original You felt universally appealing, this new iteration offers a more tailored, personal vibe while still capturing that unmistakable essence of 'you'.

reviews.review_title: Skin scents are my new obsession
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a warm, sexy, woody scent. It's if Glossier You and Santal 33 had a baby. The initial scent is a little sharp but it dries down so beautifully. It's a light scent and so so different from everything else on the market. I've been looking for a new favorite skin scent and this is definitely it! The wear time on this could be better but it kind of melts into your skin throughout the day which is lovely

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Let me start by saying I love this fragrance. It's moody, it's sexy, it's smokey - but there is ZERO staying power with it. Unfortunately I don't think I'll repurchase because it fades almost immediately. If you like this fragrance I'd recommend Libertine Troubled Spirits.

reviews.review_title: I love me some earthy woodsy scents!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I personally own Le Labo Santal 33. Glossier You Doux is just like santal 33, but it's better! Is more feminine, spiritual, and sexy at the same time.

reviews.review_title: Not for me but it has mega staying power
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Perfume is so subjective. This was a hard pass for me. I love the warm pink pepper of the original but this is so peppery, it's made me sneeze since I put it on. You need to really love this scent because its staying power is no joke; I rinsed my wrist twice AND took a shower and I can still smell both new versions.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE this scent. It is perfect. It is somehow light and airy like the original YOU scent, but has this Santal and woody spin to it. Which I love. It's very clean and fresh smelling. I was soo pleasantly surprised when I sampled this and had to buy it. Somehow perfect for the cold weather too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love it because I really do like the original. I am going to have to take it back .There is something that doesn't work with me. I don't usually return things but I was hesitant to buy it... should have listened to my gut and not the beauty advisor.

reviews.review_title: A perfect remix of Glossier You
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As a fan of Glossier You, I was very excited to try this as I love woody fragrances.  This does not disappoint. The initial spray is a bit heavier but it quickly dries down to a soft, palo-santo/you hybrid.  My perfect every-day cold weather scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was super excited to smell the new Glossier perfume and I loved the Glossier Doux. The scent lasts so long, a lot longer than the Glossier You OG perfume. It‚Äôs a little bit sweet with almost a Santal 33 hint!  Will be buying again when I run out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My co-worker turned me on to the OG You, so I was very excited when I saw this and the Reve all over my social media. I went out on a whim and purchased both. This one, on my skin, comes across VERY heavy in pepper. I am not usually a fan of anything palo santo, but thought the other notes would mask it. This is not the case. Unfortunately, I will be returning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this for my 14 year old daughter.  It smells absolutely amazing on her!  It lasts the entire day, I can still smell it when I pick her up from school.  She gets many compliments on it as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This parfume is a unique scent that I have never smelled before. It is very sophisticated and classy. I love to wear this scent on a night out to a fancy restaurant or if you work in an office it would be perfect!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a lovely cozy scent! It's very airy and woody but dries down a little sweet without being overpowering. This has been my new day scent and I love catching a whiff of it on myself especially when its windy. It has a pretty decent lasting power and also layers pretty well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am loving this woody perfume. So subtle and sophisticated. I absolutely adore the packaging and that it's not overpowering scent. Only thing is that it doesn't last that long on me. I like to layer it.

reviews.review_title: New Favorite Fall and Winter Perfume!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this perfume in store yesterday after trying it on and walking around the mall to see how the scent developed on me. I have been wearing the OG Glossier You since it was first released. Usually in the fall/winter I want something deeper/darker/sexier and have used By the Fireplace by Replica or Santal 33. This has officially replaced both of them! It's very similar. I swear if you like those you'll love this. Doux is less masculine and spicy than those scents, definitely not an exact dupe for either. It's a bit creamier but NOT gourmet and NOT floral. JUST DIVINE!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Palo Santo mixed with violet is amazing! It‚Äôs such a layered woody smell that for me personally changes depending on which pulse points I put it on. It‚Äôs so dreamy and rich but yet light, perfect for day or night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Lovely lovely scent. Beautiful notes, I‚Äôve gotten SO many compliments. I‚Äôve always loved softer scents but this is soft and airy with a splash of bold. I love how long it lasts and how it pairs with lotions! Highly highly recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is a gorgeous scent - soft and serene woody fragrance. my sister who doesn‚Äôt like fragrances normally LOVES it. It‚Äôs warm and inviting and cozy and perfect for a night out or as a fall fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm absolutely obsessed with Glossier You! This scent has become my signature fragrance - it's effortlessly me. The subtle, skin-like aroma lasts all day without being overpowering, making it perfect for everyday wear, work, or special occasions. I love the fragrance too much . The sleek packaging is an added bonus . Glossier You has earned a permanent spot on my vanity

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my new favorite scents! The sweet violet gives off a subtle floral scent that I really enjoy. It turns slightly smoky/woody thanks to the notes of frankincense and Pablo santo. This can be worn alone, but I love layering it with some of my other favorite scents.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This one I liked better than reve because of the woodsy notes to this perfume. It has a nice sweet creaminess to this one that balances beautifully with the woodsy musk notes! I think this is a great unisex scent and layering scent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: From the very first spritz of Glossier You Doux, I felt like I had discovered something truly unique. This fragrance feels like an extension of myself, enhancing my natural essence rather than masking it.  The initial burst of sweet violet is like a gentle hug soft yet comforting. As it unfolds, the earthy notes of palo santo come through, bringing a tranquil, almost meditative quality. It reminds me of walking through a serene forest, surrounded by nature's calm. As it evolves further, the hints of incense and myrrh create a rich, deep atmosphere that invites reflection.  One of the most delightful surprises has been the lasting power of this scent. Throughout the day, I find myself still enveloped in its presence. Over time, the fragrance softens, becoming more subtle yet incredibly rich, like a cherished memory that lingers in the air. The warm base of ambrox clings to my skin, making me feel grounded and at ease.  And let‚Äôs talk about the white bottle it's a beautiful piece in its own right. It feels personal and unique, as if it‚Äôs waiting for each of us to make it our own. In essence, You Doux isn‚Äôt just a perfume; it‚Äôs a tribute to individuality, reminding me that my scent is an integral part of who I am, and I really love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For this perfume it opens up very woody and spicy and as it dries down it becomes less woody and more on the sweet side. I feel like this is a genderless perfume that you can use during the morning or night as well!

This new scent from Glossier is truly amazing. I‚Äôm not usually a fan of woodsy or earthy fragrances, and I am not that into sweet scents either. However, I‚Äôm pleasantly surprised by how this perfume captivates me. Each note is perfectly balanced, adding depth without overwhelming or overshadowing the others. It‚Äôs a remarkable blend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved Glossier‚Äôs OG scent and am also loving this fun second fragrance from them. it‚Äôs warm and woodsy, and super wearable. perfect for fall days or casual nights out, and I like how it smells on me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It‚Äôs my first time trying a perfume from Glossier and I‚Äôm really impressed on how nice it smells. I love the scent of the notes especially the palo santo. It has a subtle yet unique scent that reminds me of when I‚Äôm grounding to the earth and I‚Äôm smelling my incense with the palo santo. The only thing is it lasts more on the skin than on the clothes but other than it‚Äôs a perfect scent for anyone that loves. A musky scent !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the concept of these perfumes. I can‚Äôt verify if it‚Äôs truly unique to each individual but I like the way it smells on me-warm and cozy. I do one spray so It‚Äôs not too overpowering, and the packaging is beautiful. It looks great on my vanity and I find myself reaching for it on casual days.

reviews.review_title: Great unisex fragrance, Doesn't last though ...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I personally really like this scent overall. It definitely is more of a unisex and sophisticated scent. It is NOT a cutesy, teenager scent that people wear in high school. The mom noticeable characteristics of this scent are its smokiness, incense notes, woodiness, and a tad bit of sweetness. It does not have the heaviness of a strong men's cologne at all. It is still very much sweeter than anything like that. If you like those kind of notes, then this is for you.   The negative: It doesn't last very long. It's longevity is maybe 3 - 4 hours maximum despite it being an eau de parfum. I would expect this longevity from a scent that is an eau de toilettte. After that, your nose has to be pressed against your arms skin to smell it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm obsessed with the original Glossier You fragrance, so of course I couldn't wait to get my hands on the new Glossier You Doux. First off, the all white bottle is absolutely stunning, and looks beautiful sitting next to my other You perfume on my vanity. At first spray I wasn't sure if I really liked this scent, but after I let it dry down and mix with my skin, I absolutely loved the way it smelled. It's a very soft and feminine scent, has strong floral and woodsy notes,  and ends with a powdery smell. I love the way all the notes come together, it really is a lovely perfume. It makes me feel calm and cozy, and reminds me of what a high class, sophisticated woman would smell like. It lasts a long time on my skin and it's strong without being too overpowering. It's the perfect scent to wear for the Fall and Winter seasons. I will definitely be reaching for this fragrance often. Im happy I decided to try it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a die-hard You wearer. Everyone always tells me how good I smell everything I go out. I wanted to try Doux based on some social media ads. It's a no for me.  It's a much more sophisticated scent than You. It's woodsy and mature and takes half the amount of sprays as You does to get a strong scent. As time goes on I like it less and less. I feels like it's screaming I AM WEARING PERFUME EVERYBODY!!! As opposed to You, which just melts into my skin and gives me an overall I smell good smell, if that makes sense. I feel like Doux is wearing ME, I am not wearing IT.  I never make reviews but I feel so strongly about loving You and I've had strangers stop me and buy it on the spot. People love it, as do I. Doux could easily bother people at work if they're sensitive to smells. It's... a lot. Pass on this one if you love You. It's nothing like You. You reigns supreme!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scent. It is warm, subtle and musky. I love that. It‚Äôs not overpowering and really settles into your skin after a few moments. This is the type of perfume you need to apply to your pulse points. The scent compliments your own and really last all day.

reviews.review_title: My BF loves the warm scent
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: While the new Glossier you DOUX perfume is not my cup of tea (I tend to prefer sweeter scents), my boyfriend loves to layer this scent with his fav colognes! The new scent is in the warm/woody family and smells sophisticated once it‚Äôs dried down. The bottle is sleek and modern, so it‚Äôll be the perfect gift for the upcoming holidays.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am OBSESSED with this new scent! It gives santal vibes which I love and makes for the perfect, luxurious scent year round. This will definitely be a perfume staple for me and a repurchase forever. Love!

My new favorite fragrance! I‚Äôm obsessed with this perfume from Glossier. I love the earthy and woody notes of sweet violet, palo santo, & musk. It is long lasting on the skin. Packaging is so nice too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect for everyday use. Smells amazing and it stays on you literally forever. Really liked using this and this perfume has been my go to ever since I tried it. One of the perfect complimented perfumes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first Glossier perfume. The packaging is simple and sweet , but the real power is in the long lasting scent. I only sprayed the perfume once and the scent filled the air with a smokey sweetness that reminded me of fall.  The musk, and frankincense seem to be the main scent.   I personally found the scent to be too strong and musky ,where I prefer a more sweet gourmand scent.  But for those who love a strong , long lasting, fall scent that is heavy on the musk, this fragrance is for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: New Glossier YOU Doux Review üåø‚ú®  Alright, let‚Äôs talk about New Glossier YOU Doux‚Äîthe fragrance that‚Äôs all about YOU, but elevated. This one gives off major skin-scent energy with warm woods, a hint of violet sweetness, and a musky base that melts perfectly into your skin. It‚Äôs cozy, personal, and oh-so-addictive.  üåü What It Smells Like üåü Imagine this:  Sweet Violet blooms right when you spray it, adding a soft, floral sweetness. Palo Santo, Myrrh, and Frankincense kick in with woody and smoky notes that give it a warm, meditative vibe. And the best part? Ambrox at the base‚Äîmusky, intimate, and perfectly balanced, leaving a scent trail that‚Äôs uniquely yours. It feels like a ‚Äúyou, but better‚Äù kind of fragrance, perfect for cozy nights or chill autumn days. Think less of ‚Äúwearing a fragrance‚Äù and more of enhancing the vibe you already bring.  üíï Let‚Äôs Talk Bottle Aesthetic üíï The bottle? A whole mood. Minimal, sleek, and personal‚Äîit even features the real thumbprint indent of the designer, making it an objet d‚Äôart that isn‚Äôt complete without you holding it. It‚Äôs all about that intimate connection, both with the scent and the packaging.  ‚ú® Final Thoughts ‚ú® This fragrance is perfect if you love something soft, warm, and unique to your skin chemistry. The warm woodiness lingers without overpowering, making it great for layering or wearing solo. It's lowkey but unforgettable, exactly like those moments when someone gets close and says, You smell amazing!  Rating: 9/10 ‚Äì If cozy had a scent, this would be it.  Brand: @glossier #GlossierYOU #GlossierYOUdoux #NewFragranceVibes #WoodyFragrance #SkinScentEnergy #FragranceLovers #YouButBetter

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the packaging of the glossier fragrances. The atomizer sprays a nice even mist. I have to say I prefer the original scent over this and reve. This one is probably my second choice. It definitely does seem like a more unisex fragrance. I definitely get the woody notes the most. It‚Äôs long lasting and I can‚Äôt say I‚Äôve smelled this fragrance before so definitely unique.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been loving this perfume so much! It‚Äôs a nice floral scent and the perfume less really really long throughout the day. I love the sleek packaging and how unique the scent is! Would totally get it again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this perfume is absolutely gorgeous! if you like musk you will love this! I cannot get over how long all of the glossier you perfumes last, which makes it so worth the reasonable price! highly recommend this perfume!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this a few days ago. I‚Äôm a floral scent kind of girl and I did not care for the scent as much as I wanted too. It‚Äôs more of a woody kind of scent with some spice. Now I‚Äôm not saying that‚Äôs it‚Äôs a horrible scent I just prefer floral scents on me. This would be something I would wear out on a casual day. Great perfume just not my scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I can totally see why Glossier names this one Doux because the scent is like a soft, caress to the senses. The frankincense and ambrox make it the perfect transition scent for fall. It‚Äôs like being wrapped up in a warm cashmere blanket while it snows outside. The bottle design is so pretty and unique! Makes me want to collect them all!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this beautiful perfume, very nice blend of sweet violet in the top notes with a heart of palo santo. Very nice unisex, and husband likes it as well. It‚Äôs long lasting worth a very pleasant woody smokiness in it, and clean. You Doux was launched in 2024. Definitely worth a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is surprisingly strong and nice. At first I didn't know what to think of this perfume, I really can not pin point the scent I smell, seems to be a mix of quiet a few different scents, but it's definitely strong and lasting. Very woodsy and musky i would have to say. I do love it, but my husband does not. He said I smell like a old lady.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Doux is very piney, and resembles a Christmas candle, for at least the first 30 minutes. At first myrrh and frankincense outshine all of the other notes but once they fade away, the scent is much more enjoyable. Doux is a little too masculine for my taste and I will be gifting it to my husband while keep Glossier Reve in my collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: To my surprise, this was a perfume that was very different, but in a good way. It had deeper notes of scents, something that was dark but still very feminine. Was very pleased with the way it smells and wears long all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this a few days ago. I‚Äôm a floral scent kind of girl and I did not care for the scent as much as I wanted too. It‚Äôs more of a woody kind of scent with some spice. Now I‚Äôm not saying that‚Äôs it‚Äôs a horrible scent I just prefer floral scents on me. This would be something I would wear out on a casual day. Great perfume just not my scent.

reviews.review_text: I can totally see why Glossier names this one Doux because the scent is like a soft, caress to the senses. The frankincense and ambrox make it the perfect transition scent for fall. It‚Äôs like being wrapped up in a warm cashmere blanket while it snows outside. The bottle design is so pretty and unique!
